infoText: This adapter uses the Device Manager for configuration. Please open the Device Manager tab in the admin sidebar to add and manage your virtual devices.
hintText: If you don't see the Device Manager tab, make sure admin version >= 6.13.16 is installed.
Enter a name for this device: Enter a name for this device
Map the input datapoints and configure s: Map the input datapoints and configure settings for your virtual device.
Are you sure you want to delete this dev: Are you sure you want to delete this device? All associated states will be removed.
Automatic dehumidifier control with humi: Automatic dehumidifier control with humidity target, tank-full detection, and power monitoring
The humidity sensor to monitor (e.g., fr: The humidity sensor to monitor (e.g., from a Zigbee or Z-Wave sensor)
The switch that controls the dehumidifie: The switch that controls the dehumidifier power (on/off)
Power consumption sensor for tank-full d: Power consumption sensor for tank-full detection (optional but recommended)
Some required inputs are not mapped: Some required inputs are not mapped
